P116226.project_name: Support to the Social Protection System in Health

keywords.cdata: cost of services, Expenditures, families, Health Information, Health Information System, Health Insurance, Health Insurance coverage, Health Law, HEALTH PROJECT, Health services, Health System, Health Systems, Household Income, Informatics, Information System, National Health, Nutrition, Public Health, Screening, social  security, social security

project_abstract.cdata:
The development objective of the Social Protection System in Health Project for Mexico are (i) initially preserve and later expand the popular health insurance's coverage of people without contributory social security and (ii) strengthen the capacity of the commission and state health systems to effectively administer the entitlements of the popular health insurance. The key performance outcome indicators for the project are as follows: (i) number of individuals affiliated with the popular health insurance as a percentage of the total number of individuals that are not affiliated with a contributory social security system; (ii) percentage of recommended actions implemented by federal entities resulting from the supervision action plan carried out by the commission in its four action areas; (iii) number of individuals affiliated with the popular health insurance who has
received a 'health risk screening'; (iv) number of individuals affiliated with the popular health insurance that report having received enough information to know their rights and obligations as a percentage of the total number of individuals affiliated with the popular health insurance. The restructuring to reallocate proceeds of Loan 7860-MX from one category of expenditure to another in order to allow full disbursement of the loan

P116226.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectAbstract>Los objetivos de desarrollo del proyecto de Apoyo al Sistema de Protección Social en Salud son: i) preservar (en la primera etapa) y expandir (posteriormente) la cobertura del Seguro Popular de personas que no participan del régimen contributivo de seguridad social; y ii) fortalecer la capacidad de la Comisión y de los Sistemas Estatales de Salud para administrar eficazmente los beneficios del Seguro Popular. El plan de pueblos indígenas apunta a abordar los problemas de inscripción identificados en relación con el Seguro Popular y a garantizar que las poblaciones indígenas se beneficien con el proyecto de una manera culturalmente adecuada. Los siguientes son los tres objetivos principales: 1) Proponer una estrategia de participación que aborde los obstáculos identificados en la evaluación social; 2) fortalecer la capacidad de la Comisión para analizar datos sobre los pueblos indígenas; y 3) fortalecer la capacidad de los Sistemas Estatales de Salud para respaldar la puesta en marcha de las actividades planteadas en el plan de pueblos indígenas. Se espera que el proyecto tenga un efecto positivo para los pueblos indígenas.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
